roleset.name: chess move
roleset.note: CASTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'castle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from castle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Deep Thought
example.text: Instead of *trace*-1 castling, a standard measure to safeguard the king, [D.T.]-1 made a second-rate rook maneuver at move 13; then it put a knight offside on move 16.
